text: hari he dayāla mora jaya rādhā-nātha
bāra bāra ei-bāra laha nija sātha
translation: O merciful Lord! All glory to You, Rādhā’s Lord! Again and again I pray to You. This time take me as Your own.

text: bahu yoni bhrami’ nātha! la-inu śaraṇa
translation: O Lord! After wandering through many wombs, I have taken shelter of You. Be merciful and deliver this fallen soul by Your divine power.

text: tomā chhāḍā kāro na’hi he rādhā-ramaṇa
translation: You are the world’s cause and life. Without You, no one has anything, O Lover of Rādhā!

text: tumi upekṣile nātha! ki ha-ibe gati
translation: You are the world’s auspiciousness and master. O Lord! If You neglect me, what will be my fate?

text: tomā vinā keha nāhi e dāse uddhāre
translation: I have understood that in this world there is no one but You to deliver this servant.
